show_damage.config.title: Damage Number Configuration
show_damage.tooltip.enabled: Toggle the damage number display feature on or off.
show_damage.tooltip.smallThreshold:
Damage values below this threshold are considered 'Small'.
Affects color and size.
show_damage.tooltip.mediumThreshold:
Damage values below this but above the small threshold are considered 'Medium'.
Affects color and size.
show_damage.tooltip.colorFormat:
Format: #RRGGBB
Example: #FF0000 is Red, #FFFFFF is White.
Search 'color hex code' online to find values.
show_damage.tooltip.scaleSmall:
Adjust the display size for small damage numbers.
Range: 5-100 (corresponds to 0.5x - 10.0x in-game).
show_damage.tooltip.scaleMedium:
Adjust the display size for medium damage numbers.
Range: 5-100 (corresponds to 0.5x - 10.0x in-game).
show_damage.tooltip.scaleLarge:
Adjust the display size for large damage numbers.
Range: 5-100 (corresponds to 0.5x - 10.0x in-game).
show_damage.tooltip.enableMerge: When enabled, multiple hits on the same target within a short time (e.g., from shotguns) will be accumulated and displayed as a single total number. Only the latest total is shown.
show_damage.tooltip.mergeTimeout:
The interval of inactivity (no attacks) required before finalizing and displaying the accumulated damage.
Recommended: 1000 ms (1 second).
show_damage.tooltip.gravity:
Controls how fast the damage numbers fall.
Higher value = faster falling.
show_damage.tooltip.upwardVelocity:
The initial upward pop-up speed when a damage number spawns.
Higher value = jumps higher.
show_damage.tooltip.spread:
The range of random horizontal distribution for damage numbers.
Higher value = wider spread.
show_damage.tooltip.lifetime:
Total duration the damage number stays on screen (in game ticks).
20 ticks = 1 second.
show_damage.tooltip.fadeStart:
The percentage of lifetime completed before the number starts fading out.
Example: 80 means it fades during the last 20% of its life.
show_damage.tooltip.maxDistance:
Damage numbers will not display for targets further than this distance (in blocks).
Lower value improves performance; higher value allows seeing distant damage.
Default: 32 blocks.
